record.title: MAKING FURTHER CONTINUING APPROPRIATIONS FOR THE FISCAL YEAR 2008
record.narrative:
MAKING FURTHER CONTINUING APPROPRIATIONS FOR THE FISCAL YEAR 2008 -- (Senate - December 13, 2007)

[Page: S15432]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to the immediate consideration of H.J. Res. 69, the continuing resolution just received from the House; that the joint resolution be read three times, passed, and the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, all without intervening action or debate.
I would tell everyone this is for 1 week.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The joint resolution (H.J. Res. 69) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
